channel.title: Getting thrown out of public places
channel.description: Post where you've been thrown out of and the reason.

item.title: Getting thrown out of public places
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:59, topic:417500”]I’m banned from every dennys in vancouver (seperate incidents)

dinner diving etc[/quote]
why do i get the feeling that you are a poor hobo?

item.title: Getting thrown out of public places
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

iz3 legend:

Then why post a link to the topic if you dont want it to be discussed…

I honestly don’t think you’re being serious.

Smokin flax didn’t understand what Chubby Bunny was referring to, so I gave him an example. I wasn’t asking him to discuss it, I was only showing him an example. And why would you think it’s open for discussion when it’s totally off topic from the original post? I feel like I already explained this.

Read full topic

@Cole1497 wrote:

iz3 legend:

Cole that pics out…

The website hosting it was shut down, or ran out of funding.

iz3 legend:

and the topic makes you seem like a fag hat.

First of all, I don’t even know what a “fag hat” is, second of all, this is irrelevant to the current topic. Just PM me if you want to discuss it, but the thread was what’s referred to as a “copypasta”.

item.title: Getting thrown out of public places
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“smokin flax, post:46, topic:417500”][quote author=The Chubby Bunny link=topic=520057.msg3778543#msg3778543 date=1318283014]
Me and my friends got kicked out of this church activity thing because we were in cars, and my friend kept burning out and trying to race the other car. Shit was so cash.
[/quote]
Whenever somebody has a sentence: Shit was so cash. It urks me.
It was very cool. There. You my friend, have just been grammar nazi’d[/quote]
“Shit was so cash” is a meme; see https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484802.msg3552836.html

Read full topic

item.title: Getting thrown out of public places
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:15, topic:417500”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=520057.msg3776300#msg3776300 date=1318121850]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=520057.msg3776294#msg3776294 date=1318121529]

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=520057.msg3776293#msg3776293 date=1318121471]
I got kicked out of Macy’s yesterday for going up to the management floor and throwing balls down the isle.

amicooler?
[/quote]YEAH BRO, Even if people have no proof doesn’t mean its bull.

Be like me and punch glass or a rock!
[/quote]KrackKidTV > Failed attempts to become cool over the Internet
[/quote] I know normally people don’t carry a camera with them 24/7 but I do XD[/quote]Even while taking a dump?

It’s worth it carrying, so many funny stuff happens sometimes and i always happen to have the camera at home.

As for me, I’ve only been kicked out once in my life when i was like 11 when i got into a fight for who’s turn it is to play on a computer @ an internet cafe.

Read full topic
